sorcer.core.exertion

Class LoopExertion

  • java.lang.Object
    • sorcer.service.ServiceExertion
      • sorcer.service.Task
        • sorcer.core.exertion.LoopExertion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, ConditionalExertion, Evaluation<Object>, Exec, Exertion, Identifiable, Invocation<Object>, Mappable, Revaluation, Service

    public class LoopExertion
extends Task
implements ConditionalExertion
    The loop Exertion executes its target exertion while its condition is true. Other types of looping types depend on parameters provided as described for each LoopExertion constructor.
    Author:
    Mike Sobolewski
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LoopExertion(String name, Condition condition, Exertion exertion)
      Loop: while (condition) { operand }
      LoopExertion(String name, Exertion exertion)
      Loop: while(true) { operand }
      LoopExertion(String name, int min, int max, Condition condition, Exertion invoker)
      The var loop operation is as follows: loop min times, then while condition is true, loop (max - min) times.
      LoopExertion(String name, int min, int max, Exertion exertion)
      Iteration: for i = n to m { operand }
